url: Find Candidates for Data Scientist Position

data.problem_statement:
Table:Candidates

Leetcode is staffing for multiple data science projects. Write a solution to find thebest candidateforeach projectbased on the following criteria:

Include only the top candidate (highest score) for each project. If there’s atie, choose the candidate with thelowercandidate_id. If there isno suitable candidatefor a project,do not returnthat project.

Return a result table ordered byproject_idin ascending order.

The result format is in the following example.
data.title: Find Candidates for Data Scientist Position II
